name: World of Math
description:
Latest version: Demo 0.5.1 (Feb. 28th 2022)

World of Math is a kids math game demo developed for Erasmus project G.I.G.A. by Team GIGAPotato.

The team is excited to be continuing the development further to full version! 

The project is now on hiatus, keep up with future updates by following our website.
